title: Before the iPhone there was…
description:
Level up your on-the-go gaming experience with the REDMAGIC 8S Pro at https://bit.ly/44XgqhV

Create your build at https://www.buildredux.com/linus

The iPhone revolutionized the smartphone industry and put one in nearly everyone’s pocket. But the iPhone didn’t appear from nowhere - it owes much of its inspiration to the ill-fated Apple Newton.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1529810-before-the-iphone-there-was%E2%80%A6/
